meaningMnemonic: Something that is <kanji>two</kanji> <kanji>times</kanji> is <vocabulary>double</vocabulary> (or it is just simply <vocabulary>two times</vocabulary>). Of course, this all works with things like 三倍, 百倍, and 四十二倍 as well.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
